personalInfo.about: Tehran, Iran | Bahraini National | Fluent: Persian (native), English (proficient)

summary.title: About
summary.value: Front-end engineer with expertise in React.js, Next.js, and TypeScript, delivering high-performance, scalable applications. Skilled in system design, performance optimization, and team leadership, with growing backend knowledge in Node.js & Express.

projects.description: Architected a scalable, offline-first quiz app with multi-language support, modular theming, and SEO-friendly routing, ensuring long-term maintainability.
Boosted mobile performance by achieving a 90%+ Lighthouse score, built robust form handling, and automated cloud deployments with Docker.
Led cross-functional teams to deliver integrated platforms for job seekers, students, and entrepreneurs, improving collaboration and delivery speed.
Developed the companyâ€™s first progressive web app (PWA), creating a native-like experience without relying on external libraries.
Built a Next.js e-commerce app with advanced product forms, enhancing usability and reducing input errors.
Resolved backend integration issues in Node.js, significantly improving system reliability.
Developed a content publishing platform with REST API and a financial dashboard with GraphQL-based data visualization, enabling data-driven insights.

projects.title: Simple Resume Builder:
projects.description: Built a React + TypeScript tool for generating PDF resumes from JSON input.

projects.title: React Modal Pro (NPM Package):
projects.description: Created a lightweight modal library with native-like back navigation; published to npm.

highlight.title: Key Strengths
highlight.value: Proven ability to design scalable systems, lead teams, and deliver high-performance front-end solutions.
